EmailTemplate.subject: Protect your aircraft components against unforeseen failures
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We know your aircraft is a significant investment and you need cost-effective ways to protect it while ensuring maximum availability and control operating expenses. With our Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) – Components (Avionics/Mechanical), count on us to ensure that your aircraft is flight-ready with minimal disruption to your operation.
Honeywell MSP gives you access to our global network of service centers and you’ll receive quick service and legendary support from our technical experts. With us on your side, you have all the tools you need to handle unforeseen issues and keep your aircraft in service—without breaking the bank.
Our MSP – Components (Avionics/Mechanical) is extremely flexible, letting you choose the coverage that best meets your needs. Benefits include:
- 24/7 Aircraft On Ground (AOG) emergency service - Factory-backed support identical to your original factory warranty - Field support system worldwide - Large Fleet and High AC utilization discounts
